attributes.action: Do not pay benefits to imigrants until they have worked & payed into the tax system for 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a host country the UK should not pay any benefits,(Child benefit, SSP,family tax credit, Job seekers allowance,disability benefits etc) to immigrants until they have worked & payed into the tax system for 5 years.The savings to the state would be immense, the attraction to settle in the UK would be lessened & would be a huge votes winner for any party strong enough to introduce common sense like this into its Policies.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ISWFTRTB/

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
